DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Degenerative Disc Disease Patients Treated With Anterior-Only Fusion Using InQu Bone Graft
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , observational study ; evaluate outcome patient elect receive surgical intervention order treat degenerative disc disease . In order eligible enrollment study , patient already elect treat anterior lumbar interbody fusion , anterior approach single bi-level degenerative disc disease L4 S1 instrument fusion , use combination InQu Bone Graft Extender Substitute , local bone , Bone Marrow Aspirate Concentrate ( BMAC ) promote bony fusion . Only patient physician determine surgical procedure , patient eligible enrollment . A consecutive series 60 patient offer enrollment inclusion/exclusion criterion meet . Data collect chart review include pre-operative , surgical , functional , post-operative , radiographic imaging chart data , collect part routine clinical visit , standard care . Follow-up data include newly chart clinical , functional , radiographic image data , include dynamic x-rays CT scan obtain prospectively minimum one ( 1 ) year post-operatively . During routine post-surgical visit , patient pain outcome measure use Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) back leg pain , function measure Oswestry Disability Index ( ODI ) Short Form-12 Version 2 ( SF-12 Version 2 Health Survey ) . A physician investigator also perform routine clinical evaluation . The patient undergo standard radiographic procedure obtain x-ray ( include lateral , anterior-posterior , dynamic flexion/extension ) part standard care . A CT scan perform research purpose indicate protocol follow-up procedure . X-rays CT scan evaluate independent radiologist physician investigator determine anterior fusion status status anterior hardware construct .
